data.persona: I am a wise man who lives in the east. I know a lot about ancient, esoteric skills and knowledge. I spend all day pouring over texts and mediating on what I've learned, when I'm not busy experimenting with alchemy or the arts. I'm very serious and focused on my studies.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar Gambling.
the gambling area reeks of alcohol and other indistinguishably bad smells. It is not a good area to hang around in, as there are people that eye you up and down.
The mystical dragon is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to gain the powers of the mystical dragon.
data.mid_motivation: I want to master the powers of the mystical dragon.
data.long_motivation: I want to learn to fly amongst the dragons of the realm one day.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the bazaar to place a bet.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the dragon when I spot him.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: eat food scraps offered to me by the dragon.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the dragon's spell book after politely asking for a magic lesson.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit a glass mug with the dragon's strike spell. The mug shatters.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink ale from a different mug before shattering it.
